title: Must Read: Versace Releases Donatella's Final Campaign, Jonathan Anderson Reboots Namesake Label
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Thursday. Versace unveiled its Fall 2025 campaign on Thursday, marking Donatella Versace's last with the brand after she announced she'll be stepping back from her role as chief creative officer. Photographed by Mert & Marcus and styled by ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
